sub_fields.label: Anchorlinks position
sub_fields.name: anchorlinks_position
sub_fields.instructions: Show anchor links at the top of the article by activating "At the top of the article" option.  Use this option on pages that are using "Default" page template.

choices.position_at_top: At the top of the article

sub_fields.label: Background color
sub_fields.name: background_color
sub_fields.instructions:
Theme green: #83cac6
Theme red: #f9bdb2
Theme yellow: #f0e856

sub_fields.label: Show numbering
sub_fields.name: show_numbering
sub_fields.instructions: This selection allows you to show or hide the numbering between the steps

sub_fields.label: Section heading
sub_fields.name: section_heading
sub_fields.instructions:
Section heading -field supports screen reader users by describing the accordion section.
For example: Use here the same heading (h2) text that one used inside the Content area earlier.

sub_fields.instructions: This block creates anchor tag to the page and you can use anchor link to link to it. Please don't use spaces or special characters.
